item.title: Eksctl
item.description: The first method to launch an EKS cluster is using eksctl the tool built by weaveworks. For linux: Download the eksctl binary: curl --silent --location "https://github.com/weaveworks/eksctl/releases/latest/download/eksctl_$(uname -s)_amd64.tar.gz" | tar xz -C /tmp sudo mv -v /tmp/eksctl /usr/local/bin For MacOSx Install via Homebrew brew install eksctl For Windows Install via Chocolatey chocolatey install -y eksctl Confirm the eksctl command works: eksctl version Enable eksctl bash-completion eksctl completion bash >> ~/.
